name: Raspberry-Pi-GPIO
tagline: Useful examples and lessons for using the GPIO on the Raspberry Pi.
body:
# Raspberry Pi GPIO ## Library and Tutorials This repository contains useful examples and lessons for using the GPIO on the Raspberry Pi. Each lesson contains source files that are designed to be reused in projects and other applications. Feel free to fork and submit a pull request with additions and modifications. Submit an issue for direct communication about suggested improvements or help. ## Lessons 1. [Blink](./01-Blink/Lesson01.md) - blinking a LED. 2. [Button](./02-Button/Lesson02.md) - control a LED with a button. 3. Interfaces
  1. I2C
  2. SPI
4. Sensors 5. Analog Input 6. Analog Sensors 7. LCD's 8. Servos 9. DC Motor 10. Stepper Motor 11. GPIO using C 12. GPIO using Node.JS 13. Web GPIO Interface
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
